model

Class Cube

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Cube

  • public class Cube
extends Object
    Represents a cube of the puzzle, by its absolute position.
    Author:
    Joffrey Bion

    • Field Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getFirstCube

        static Cube getFirstCube()
        Returns the first Cube of the model, which is the starting point of the representation.
        Returns:
        The first Cube of the model.

      • getSecondCube

        static Cube getSecondCube()
        Returns the second Cube of the model, which is next to the first cube.
        Returns:
        The second Cube of the model.

      • add

        Cube add(int axis,
       int value)
        Adds the specified value to the specified axis of this cube.
        Parameters:
        axis - The axis to add value to.
        value - The value to add to axis.
        Returns:
        This cube.

      • directionTo

        int[] directionTo(Cube other)
        Gives the direction to the specified other cube. This method must not be called on a cube that is not net to this cube.
        Parameters:
        other - Another cube to get the direction to.
        Returns:
        An array direction such that:
        • direction[0] is the axis to follow to find other
        • direction[1] is either 1 or -1, depending on the relative position of other on the axis with respect to this cube

        public String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object
